name: Pathfinder (iRgamer)
description:
Pathfinder is a Maze puzzle game. Currently on development and was release for testing in 2017 ( that's quite some time ago ) on google play store. 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.iRgamer.Pathfinder&hl=en

But with limited knowledge at that time the development was on hold after i release the first test(alpha) version to play store. At least the main part of the game was done, so i think. Now its back on development again! with currently 2 puzzle to solve somewhat quite easy to navigate. This release is basically a graphic overhaul before I start crafting some more better puzzles.

Inspired by games like Myst, Syberia and XON episode 1. Currently under development and is targeted for mobile platform.

Not every play through will be the same. 

Hope you enjoy it.
